body:
## Highlights
- Introduces two new commands `mc put` and `mc get` for fast uploads that uses less
  API calls over `mc cp`, allowing for more scripting and batch upload friendly.

## What's Changed
* feat: add put action by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/mc/pull/4839
* Enable --expire-all-object-versions by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/mc/pull/4840

* feat: add mc get by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/mc/pull/4847
* adding help menu to put command when no parameters are present by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/mc/pull/4852
* fix: add showLastProgressBar by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/mc/pull/4855
* Do not validate deployment id from license if nil uuid by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/mc/pull/4856

- Bug fixes for mirror, ls, rm, stat, mb commands.

body:
## Highlights
- **Breaking Change** in multi-user, new command `mc admin policy` is introduced, this command sets policy for user and group. 
   - `mc admin user set-policy` is now removed.
   - `mc admin uesr add` no longer accepts a policy to set on the user.
Upgrade is recommended if you upgrade `mc` make sure to upgrade MinIO server as well to [latest](https://github.com/minio/minio/releases/tag/RELEASE.2019-08-14T20-37-41Z)

- Introduce a new command `du` to calculate usage statistics on buckets and prefixes.

body:
# Highlights

- Auto-completion for mc (i.e. commands, options and arguments) is not enabled by default any more - `mc` will no longer prompt to install autocompletion. Opt in with `mc --autocompletion`.
- **BREAKING CHANGE:** If the `mc` binary is renamed, its configuration directory will also respect this name change. For example, if `mc` is renamed to `mcli`, it will look for configuration in `$HOME/.mcli` instead of in `$HOME/.mc`, and if it is not found, it will be created.
    - Existing installations which have a renamed binary would need to move their configuration directory. 

# Changelog

- Fix auto-completion code (#2819) (07/11/2019)
- Remove port 9000 for play.min.io (#2817) (07/10/2019)
name: Major Bug Fix Release

body:
### Highlights
- Rewrite `mirror` to be simpler no more `--watch` command mirror defaults to `watch` behavior and doesn't store any session files. 
- Support [S3 Transfer Acceleration URL](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/transfer-acceleration.html)
- Support for fully normalized unicode characters. 
- Preserve metadata properly while doing `mirror` and `cp` .
- Allow deleting of objects which end with '/'.
- Add `policy links` command to generate public URLs for readonly buckets.

### ChangeLog
- mirror: Avoid session and enable continuous mirror (#1992) (2 days ago) <Anis Elleuch>
- Allow saving accessKey, secretKey which is empty. (#1990) (8 days ago) <Harshavardhana>
- Add build support for pine64 (#1987) (8 days ago) <Harshavardhana>
- Mirror: normalize keys before comparing (#1978) (9 days ago) <Aaron Walker>
- client: S3 and Admin clients should have TLSConfig. (#1977) (10 days ago) <Harshavardhana>
- cli: update with urfave/cli changes (#1968) (2 weeks ago) <Harshavardhana>
- sort output of mc config host list (#1959) (3 weeks ago) <poornas>
- links: Print encoded form of public URLs (#1947) (4 weeks ago) <Anis Elleuch>
- Enable support for s3 transfer acceleration. (#1946) (4 weeks ago) <Harshavardhana>
- api: StatObject if listing returned missing file. (#1945) (4 weeks ago) <Harshavardhana>
- Add policy links command (#1943) (4 weeks ago) <Anis Elleuch>
- session: Validate session config header version. (#1940) (5 weeks ago) <Harshavardhana>
- Simplify loading config and use config loader with version check. (#1939) (5 weeks ago) <Harshavardhana>
- rm: Allow delete of objects with / at the end. (#1937) (5 weeks ago) <Harshavardhana>
- enable static build releases with CGO_ENABLED=0 (#1935) (6 weeks ago) <Harshavardhana>
- mirror/cp/pipe: Preserve metadata while copying s3 to s3. (#1927) (7 weeks ago) <Harshavardhana>
- mirror: --remove should properly remove files on target. (#1926) (7 weeks ago) <Harshavardhana>
name: Bug fix and feature release

body: Fix a crash in `mc mirror --watch`

- Fixes a crash when parallel mc instances try to migrate session files (#1812)
- Add --insecure flag to skip certificate validation (#1814)
- mc: Do not print accounting with '--json' (#1815)
- Add policy list command (#1811)
- Bring new fixes from minio-go related to PutObject and GetObject (#1822)
- Avoid seeking os.Stdin in client-fs Put() (#1834)

name: Bug fix release.
Bug fix release, fixes a regression in 'mc mirror -w'

body:
- Introduce **events** command to manage bucket notifications.
- Introduce **watch** command to watch for all events on object storage (dynamic SNS) and filesystem (fsnotify).
- Introduce **mc mirror -w** for continuous mirroring (no need for cronjob anymore uses dynamic SNS).
- Fixed a lot of issues with bucket policy handling. 
- Other misc bug-fixes.
name: Stable release bug fixes and new features.

body:
:cake: :cake: :cake: 

Major highlights
- China region support
- mirror and diff (now handled bi-directional diff) rewrite.  Thanks to @vadmeste 
- Many other bug fixes including proper HTTP connection pooling, handling of retries on various s3 timeouts.
- URL handling fixes.
- Case insensitive API signature in config.
name: Major bug fix release

body:
:cake:  :cake:  :cake: 
- access: Access policy command implemented to make your buckets. [readwrite, readonly, writeonly] publicly accessible.
- windows: Add progress bar windows fixes.
- session: Remove stale backup files.
- mirror: has --fake option.
- diff: diffs are listed based on time.
- do not progress progress bar in case of failure. 
- config migrate to new version '8'
- pipe: avoid double mem copy.
- support mc to access access key and secret key from environment variables.
- http client timeout increased to 8 min.
name: Minio client bug fix release and new features
Minor point release - supporting Solaris and Freebsd officially.

body:
- Parallel code for cp and mirror is deprecated in favor of serial code to make session management more simpler. 
- Config file has been changed now `http://` prefixed urls are not supported, only s3 requests are based on aliases.
- No temporary files are used during file uploads, memory is used as scratch space.
- Progress bar is simplified further now, progress bar reader is progressed by PutObject API.  
- Error message changes to make it more human readable.
- Filesystem code fully behaves like S3 functionality now.
- Make bucket 'mc' has --region option now to specify bucket location.

And many more.
name: Major 'mc' release

body:
- Update urls for 'mc'
- Fixes #1545 - mc session resume <session-id>
name: Bug fix release

body:
- mc cp resume from filesystem to local would fail due to a bug inside fs.go. 
- now should detect Content-Type properly for the object being uploaded.
- presigned signature for upload had an issue should be fixed.
- alias construction would fail for multiple aliases to same host - fixed.
- mc ls -I for incomplete uploads - prefix would fail.
- handle alias strings properly on windows.
name: Bug fix release

body:
- Re-implementing ‘mc diff’ and ‘mc mirror’ with streaming style.
- Supports Google Cloud Storage (GCS).
- Supports Swift/Ceph (Community validation by — @dudymas).
- Introducing ‘mc share upload/download’ commands for treating your s3 bucket like a dropbox.
- Supports now ARM architecture. 
- Introducing ‘mc rm’ command to remove file or bucket.
- Introducing ‘mc pipe’ command for streaming file uploads.
- New feature ‘mc ls’ to list all incomplete uploads.
- New feature ‘ — quiet’ mode during ‘cp’ and ‘mirror’ — now does accounting of data transfer and prints summary upon   completion.
- Many other bug fixes at https://github.com/minio/mc.
name: mc new release
